message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm starting the negotiations at a price of $1500000. I'm confident that this is a fair price, but I'm open to discussing it further. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I understand your perspective. While I value your interest, $1200000 is unfortunately below my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1350000, reflecting the unique value of this product. This offer is a good compromise, and I hope you'll consider it.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1300000. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
